name: Sherry Berry Boom Blast
description:
A little game I made for the Juice Jam founder here: https://itch.io/jam/gdb-juice-jam

Controls

A and D to move or left and right arrow keys

Space to Jump

Left Mouse to shoot

I first looked for a color palette on lospec.com (https://lospec.com/palette-list) and decided to use Cherry Love by LostInIndigo which inspired a bit of the game. The palette and the fact that February is next month (at the time of making this) made me think of Valentine's Day. So the protagonist's motivation is collecting chocolates that had been stolen from her so that she can gift them to her mate. You win the game when you are able to retrieve 10 of them.

Story

You are Sherry, a cute little dog girl who had just purchased chocolates for her beloved, a rabbit named Cotton. But alas, they had been stolen from you! Pilfered by some metal cat!

Now you must pick up your gun and bring war to the feline automatons and get back what is rightfully Cotton's! 

The Music that I used is by Abstraction who you can find the work of here: http://www.abstractionmusic.com/
